about_the_game:
Full music track from Australian Trip
(7 tracks MP3 44100Hz stereo 320kbps )
===========================================
1. Edward d-tech - Australian Trip OST - 01 opening.mp3 (02:42)
2. Edward d-tech - Australian Trip OST - 02 rock-n-lava-02:42 (04:44)
3. Edward d-tech - Australian Trip OST - 03 rock-n-lava-2.mp3 (04:44)
4. Edward d-tech - Australian Trip OST - 04 grasslands.mp3 (04:45)
5. Edward d-tech - Australian Trip OST - 05 waterflow-1.mp3 (03:36)
6. Edward d-tech - Australian Trip OST - 05 waterflow-2.mp3 (04:45)
7. Edward d-tech - Australian Trip OST - 07 ending.mp3 (02:46)
============================================
After download you can find files in ..\Steam\steamapps\common\AustralianTrip\DLC folder patch
